/v1/projects/{project_id}/close¶

Contents

  • /v1/projects/{project_id}/close

POST /v1/projects/{project_id}/close¶

Close a project

Parameters¶

  • project_id: The UUID of the project

Response status codes¶

  • 404: The project doesn’t exist
  • 204: The project has been closed
